1.name: WORKORDER_ASSIGN_EMAIL
1.subject: New Workorder Assigned
1.message:
A new work order has been assigned to you.

Subject : ${workorder.subject}
Description : 
${workorder.description:-}

Please follow ${workorder.url} to view the work order.

Regards,
Team Facilio

2.name: WORKORDER_ACTIVITY_FOLLOWUP
2.subject: Workorder Follow
2.message: A new work order has been assigned to you. Please follow the link below to view the work order.

A new work order has been assigned to you. Please follow the link below to view the work order.
${workorder.url}

5.name: ALARM_CREATION_EMAIL
5.subject: New Alarm raised
5.message:
${alarm.description}

Please follow ${alarm.url} to view the alarm and acknowledge it as soon as possible.

Regards,
Team Facilio

6.name: ALARM_CREATION_SMS
6.message: [${alarm.modifiedTimeString}] [NEW Alarm:#ID${alarm.id}] "${alarm.severity.severity}" alarm reported for source "${alarm.source}". Alarm message: "${alarm.subject}". State: ${alarm.state}.

7.name: ALARM_UPDATION_SMS
7.message: [${alarm.modifiedTimeString}] [UPDATED Alarm:#ID${alarm.id}] "${alarm.previousSeverity.severity}" alarm updated to "${alarm.severity.severity}" for source "${alarm.source}". Alarm message: "${alarm.subject}". State: ${alarm.state}.

notification.text: [${alarm.modifiedTimeString}] [NEW Alarm:#ID${alarm.id}] "${alarm.severity.severity}" alarm reported for source "${alarm.source}". Alarm message: "${alarm.subject}". State: ${alarm.state}.
notification.title: New Alarm

notification.text: [${alarm.modifiedTimeString}] [UPDATED Alarm:#ID${alarm.id}] "${alarm.previousSeverity.severity}" alarm updated to "${alarm.severity.severity}" for source "${alarm.source}". Alarm message: "${alarm.subject}". State: ${alarm.state}.
notification.title: New Alarm
